overview: Naira and Adrian have been in a relationship for 4 years. both now offer the choice of continuing or the relationship that has been established on top of these differences.Things get even more complicated after the two meet new people in their lives. Naira meets Rakha.Meanwhile, Adrian, met with Alexa. So, can Naira and Adrian continue to survive above differences? Or just bury their dream to be together forever?
title: Hari Ini Kenapa, Naira?
